body:
Update Go to 1.16.6 which includes a security fix for CVE-2021-34558. Also fix up some formatting and offer myself as a maintainer.

**Changelog:**
- Includes a security fix to the crypto/tls package, as well as bug fixes to the compiler, and the net and net/http packages.

Full changelog can be found [here](https://golang.org/doc/devel/release#go1.16.minor).

**Test Plan:**
Go 1.16.6 built successfully within the Autamus pipeline [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/runs/3069435321).
title: Add Go v1.16.6
